sql-script.tran-sql:
simpleos_nav
create table simpleos_nav ( id bigint not null, title varchar(64) not null, url varchar(128) not null, image varchar(64) not null, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

simpleos_custom
create table simpleos_custom ( id bigint not null, name varchar(64) not null, type varchar(64) not null, value text, primary key(id), unique (type, name) );

simpleos_site_links
create table simpleos_site_links ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null default 0, documentid bigint not null default 0, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), createdate datetime not null, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, buildIn tinyint(1), oorder bigint not null, extend1 varchar(128), extend2 varchar(128), primary key(id), unique (documentid, name), unique (parentid, text) );
